org.beryx.textio.web

Class TextTerminalData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.beryx.textio.web.TextTerminalData

  • public class TextTerminalData
extends java.lang.Object
    The data sent by the server to a polling web component. Includes:
    • an action to be executed by the web component (NONE, VIRTUAL, FLUSH, READ, READ_MASKED, CONTINUE_READ, CLEAR_OLD_INPUT, DISPOSE or ABORT).
    • a boolean value indicating whether the terminal should reset its settings before performing the specified action.
    • a list of TextTerminalData.MessageGroups, each one consisting of a list of settings (represented as TextTerminalData.KeyValues) and a list of prompt messages.
